name: Silent Hill Play Novel
description:
Just in time for Halloween, I present you the version 1.1 of this demake made with GB Studio, I'm still testing it but I think it's very functional! 

This version only has Harry's scenario so far, version 2 will feature Cybill's scenario, so stay tuned. 

You can play it in browser, or download it and play it in your favorite emulator/flashcart.

If you happen to find some error please let me know, thanks for playing!
